SELECT a.id AS id, a.account AS account, a.ip AS ip, a.ERROR_DATE AS errorDate, b.china_name AS chinaName, e.ENTERPRISE_NAME AS enterpriseName, e.TAX_REFUND_CODE AS taxRefundCode FROM sys_user_account_error_login a LEFT JOIN sys_user b ON a.account = b.account LEFT JOIN sys_user_enterprise_rel r ON r.user_id = b.id left join b_enterprise e on e.id = r.enterprise_id WHERE 1=1
AND b.account LIKE CONCAT('%', #{account}, '%')
AND b.china_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{chinaName}, '%')
